title: TV & General Mounting
description: Mount your TV safely and beautifully. Professional installation that finds studs, ensures level mounting, and hides cables for a clean, professional look.
purpose: Safely mount TVs, soundbars, and displays at the perfect height and angle while hiding cables and ensuring structural integrity. Create a clean, professional entertainment setup.
outcomes: Avoid costly wall repairs from mistakes
Maximize viewing comfort with proper height
whatYouCanBuild: TV wall mounts (fixed, tilt, or full-motion)
Soundbar mounting below or above TV
whyNeed: You need this if you want to avoid hitting electrical wires or pipes, if you want it level (not crooked), if you want cables hidden (not a mess), or if you want it secure (not falling off the wall).
whatYouGet: TV mounted at perfect viewing height and angle
Hidden cables for clean, professional look
